story_10_54000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the
Pokémon Masters League.
Let the opening ceremony begin!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I am Lear, host and founder of this tournament.
I expect your undivided attention now!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Sync pairs who stand before me...you have
proven your strength by collecting all five
PML Badges!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0400_10:
This tournament will decide which team among
you is the strongest of all. I had Pasio designed
and built for that very purpose!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0500_10:
So rise, my ambitious Trainers!
Climb the ranks and unleash your power!
Claim the ultimate victory as your own!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Or at least entertain the hilarious thought
that you might actually win.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Why hilarious? Because you have no chance.
I, Lear, am unquestionably the strongest of all!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Sounds like the tournament matches will be
starting soon. I wonder what sort of battles
await us...
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Cynthia... I should have guessed she’d
be able to get at least this far.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I see Blue and Red, too, but I suppose that’s
to be expected as well.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1200_10:
If we continue to win, we’ll end up facing
powerhouse Trainers like them somewhere
down the line...
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Wait...we’re already gonna be competing with
the best of the best, starting right now!
We’ve gotta try our absolute hardest!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1400_10:
You’re right. But we went through the
same trials and tribulations that they did.
We belong here just as much as they do.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1500_10:
If we unite our hearts as a team, we can
defeat any opponent! I believe in us.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Unite your hearts...as a team? *snort*
That is the most ridiculous thing I’ve ever heard!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I must say, I never thought the likes of you
would make it this far... I smell Foul Play.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_1900_10:
E-excuse me?! We’re Trainers of integrity!
We collected our badges fair and square!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2100_10:
It seems you made an error when choosing our
PML Leaders. They must have been complete
garbage to have let these amateurs through!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Uhh, did you wake up on the wrong side
of bed this morning, Master Lear?
You’re even crankier than usual.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Of course I am! All I could see during the
ceremony was that cheeky red-hatted twerp!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Ugh... That kid infuriates me!
I shall not rest until I defeat him once and for all!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2600_10:
That goes for you, too! Another pip-squeak in a
stupid hat! It’s like you are TRYING to annoy me!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Word of advice, Lear: [Name:PlayerNickname ]
is a lot stronger than the last time we met.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2800_10:
If you let your guard down, you might be
surprised at the results.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_2900_10:
You aren’t actually implying that I could LOSE to
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ], are you? Hah! When Tepig fly, maybe!
That’s absurd!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_3000_10:
None of you belong in this tournament!
Just hurry up and lose so I can be rid of you!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_3100_10: Tsk! Still as pleasant as ever, isn’t he!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Are you just gonna let him get away with
saying that stuff, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?!
story_10_54000/2401_0301_3300_10:
I’ll make him regret it next time
we battle!
story_10_54000/2401_0401_3400_10:
Good answer. We sync pairs should settle our
scores with Pokémon battles.
story_10_54000/2401_0302_3500_10:
Right now, I’m more focused on
getting stronger.
story_10_54000/2401_0402_3600_10:
It’s great to be humble and all...but all of us here
are full-fledged sync pairs. That’s something we
should be proud of.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_3700_10:
If we keep winning, I’m sure we’ll eventually
have to face him. When the time comes,
let’s show him what we’re made of!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_3900_10: Hey! Look over there! Isn’t that...
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4200_10:
It’s good to see you again!
And if you’re here, that must mean...
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Yep. I managed to form my own team
and collect every last badge.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4400_10:
Now that I’m this strong, I won’t let
anyone...anyone...
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4600_10:
Uhh, are you feeling OK, Paulo?
You look a little pale...
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Sorry...
I’m probably just a little tired. That’s all.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4800_10:
A lot’s happened since we arrived
here, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
We both managed to make it this far.
story_10_54000/2401_1001_4900_10:
But I worked harder than ever to get to this point.
I don’t plan on losing anytime soon!
story_10_54000/2401_1001_5000_10: I’ll see you in the finals!
